sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaStore, FaShoppingBag, FaChartLine, FaUsers, FaPlus, FaSearch, FaBell, FaCog, FaUser, FaShoppingCart, FaStar } from 'react-icons/fa'; import StoreCard from '../components/StoreCard'; const StoreDashboard = () => { const [stores, setStores] = useState([]); const [recentOrders, setRecentOrders] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalStores: 0, totalProducts: 0, totalOrders: 0, totalRevenue: 0 }); const [showCreateStore, setShowCreateStore] = useState(false); const [newStore, setNewStore] = useState({ name: '', slug: '', description: '' }); useEffect(() => { // هنا المفروض تستدعي API أو قاعدة بيانات // مثال: // fetch("/api/stores").then(res => res.json()).then(data => setStores(data)); // fetch("/api/orders/recent").then(res => res.json()).then(data => setRecentOrders(data)); // fetch("/api/stats").then(res => res.json()).then(data => setStats(data)); }, []); const handleCreateStore = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const store = { id: stores.length + 1, ...newStore, logo: null, coverImage: null, productsCount: 0, ordersCount: 0, rating: 0, isActive: true, createdAt: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }; setStores([...stores, store]); setNewStore({ name: '', slug: '', description: '' }); setShowCreateStore(false); }; const handleEditStore = (store) => { console.log('Edit store:', store); }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'مكتمل': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'قيد المعالجة': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'ملغي': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

لوحة التحكم

مرحباً بعودتك إلى Home Craft

{[ { icon: FaStore, label: 'إجمالي المتاجر', value: stats.totalStores, color: 'from-purple-600 to-purple-800', bgColor: 'bg-purple-50' }, { icon: FaShoppingBag, label: 'إجمالي المنتجات', value: stats.totalProducts, color: 'from-blue-600 to-blue-800', bgColor: 'bg-blue-50' }, { icon: FaChartLine, label: 'إجمالي الطلبات', value: stats.totalOrders, color: 'from-green-600 to-green-800', bgColor: 'bg-green-50' }, { icon: FaUsers, label: 'إجمالي الإيرادات', value: `${stats.totalRevenue.toLocaleString()} ريال`, color: 'from-orange-600 to-orange-800', bgColor: 'bg-orange-50' } ].map((stat, index) => (

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

))}

{/* Performance Tips */}

نصائح لتحسين الأداء

  • أضف صوراً عالية الجودة لمنتجاتك
  • استخدم أسعاراً تنافسية
  • رد بسرعة على استفسارات العملاء

إنشاء متجر جديد

setNewStore({ ...newStore, name: e.target.value })} className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="أدخل اسم المتجر" required />
setNewStore({ ...newStore, slug: e.target.value })} className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="رابط-المتجر" required />
)}
); }; export default StoreDashboard;
